thread.title: Juvenile Shot in Allentown | PHOTOS – The Morning Call
thread.title_full: Juvenile Shot in Allentown | PHOTOS – The Morning Call

author: Rich Rolen
title: Juvenile Shot in Allentown | PHOTOS – The Morning Call
text:
Juvenile transported to hospital after being shot in Allentown, his injuries do not appear to be life threatening.
Allentown police investigate a shooting Thursday, June 13, 2024, that injured a juvenile male and sent him to the hospital.Police responded to the shooting near North Nagle and Allen streets around 3:34 p.m. and found the male had suffered a gunshot wound, according to Capt. Alicia Conjour.The male’s injuries do not appear to be life threatening, Conjour said.
